Context:
The self-services Records Request portal at George Brown College has been permanently closed as of October 27, 2021, and the college is transitioning to the MyCredsâ„¢ platform in mid-November. During this transition period, no orders will be accepted.

George Brown College collects personal information under the Ontario Colleges of Applied Arts and Technology Act and in accordance with the Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act. The college collects personal information for administering its statutory objects and powers, programs, activities, and to carry out other services and functions.

Employers or other third parties can submit an Education Verification Request form to obtain information about a student or alumni's registration, academic history, or credentials. The college's contact information is 416-415-2000 (voice), TTY: 1-877-515-5559, and ask.george@georgebrown.ca.

The information contained in the website is subject to change without notice and should not be viewed as a representation, offer, or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
